item.title: Airtel Q1 Preview: Street Estimates Strong Quarter; SEBI RA Sees Potential Rally To Fresh Highs
item.description: Key support levels lie between ₹1,880 - ₹1,900 and then at ₹1,720 - ₹1,750, according to the analyst

item.title: India’s Nayara Energy Sends First Fuel Shipment Post-EU Sanctions; US-India Tensions Rise Over Russia Ties
item.description: Russian Rosneft holds a 49.13% stake in Nayara. Meanwhile, tensions mount as Trump targets India with steep tariff threats over its Russia ties.

item.title: Will S&P 500 Extend Its Purple Patch? Most Retail Traders Brace For Negative Returns In August
item.description: The S&P 500 Index, a measure of broader U.S. market performance, gained 2.2% in July.

item.title: Oil Markets: Supply Concerns Push Crude Prices Lower Despite Trump’s Tariff Threats On India
item.description: Brent crude prices slipped by 0.3% at $68.59 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude prices fell by 0.6% at $65.87 per barrel at 4.50 a.m...

item.title: Oil Markets: Supply Concerns Push Crude Prices Lower Despite Trump’s Tariff Threats On India
